## HttpRequest.requestText() method

Fetch a text string from remote.

**Signature:**

```typescript
requestText(url: string): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | The remote URL to fetch. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;string&gt;

The fetch result.
